1.0.name: wordpress/smartfilter
1.0.description:
Building the perfect blog takes time and effort. Hackers only need minutes to jeopardize your work.

SmartFilter is the security plugin that relates to the needs of every kind of blogger. It is simple to use but intelligent. It allows users the freedom they need to enhance their blogs without ever having to worry or even understand security.

SmartFilter’s modern algorithms understands how content behaves and can therefore detect code injections more efficiently than traditional firewalls and security solutions. Not only does it detect threats, it filters them out instantly! (You’re welcome).

What does this mean for you?

In a few words, SmartFilter makes sure you exploit the full potential of your blog without limitations:

  • Never worry about hacked comments.
  • Never worry about hacked posts.
  • Never worry about your templates being broken.

What does this mean for you blog?

  • Allow more co
